scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true next dev -p 3000
scripts.dev-all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev --workspace=provider-one" "npm run dev --workspace=provider-two"
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.standalone: npm run build && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true NODE_ENV=production PORT=3000 node .next/standalone/server.js
